page.title: 11Car Ownership
page.content: We interviewed three people in yates ave to find out about their cars. We also went Norman road and Quarry close.Every one we visited had a car. Most people like their car and need them to get to one place or another. The most popular make of car was a ford, either sierra or cortina. A lot of people have special nicknames for their cars. None of the people we interviewed had new cars, in fact the average age of the cars was 15 years of age. When asked if they thought their car was good value, all of them thought they had got a fair deal.
